mapper.select: SELECT O.O_NO, O.*, P.*, D.*, U.*, A.* FROM T4_ORDER O INNER JOIN T4_PRODUCT P ON O.P_NO = P.P_NO INNER JOIN T4_DELIVERY D ON O.BUY_NO = D.BUY_NO INNER JOIN T4_DELIVERY_USER U ON O.U_ID = U.U_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT O.O_NO, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T4_ORDER O INNER JOIN T4_DELIVERY D ON O.BUY_NO = D.BUY_NO INNER JOIN T4_PRODUCT P ON O.P_NO = P.P_NO AND O.O_NO = O.O_NO GROUP BY GROUP BY D.BUY_NO ) A ON O.O_NO = A.O_NO AND D.DU_NO = U.DU_NO WHERE O.U_ID = #{uId} GROUP BY O.O_NO
SELECT * FROM T4_CART C INNER JOIN T4_PRODUCT P ON C.P_NO = P.P_NO WHERE U_ID = #{uId}
mapper.update: UPDATE T4_DELIVERY SET D_STATE = '구매확정' WHERE BUY_NO = #{buyNo}
UPDATE T4_DELIVERY D INNER JOIN T4_ORDER O ON D.BUY_NO = O.BUY_NO SET D_STATE = '고객 사유로 거절', EXCHANGE = 'R' WHERE D.BUY_NO = #{buyNo}
